# LibraryGenreSortProperties

**Protocol**

Genre properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryGenreSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the genre to the library.
- **name**: The localized name of the genre.

items.description: The date when the user added the genre to the library.
